p: Human rhabdomyosarcoma cells (RD) were cultured in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) [ 28]. Clinically isolated EV71 strains FY0805 (GenBank accession no. HQ882182) and a mouse-adapted EV71 strain MP10 (GenBank accession no. HQ712020) derived from FY0805 [ 29] were cultured along with RD cells, respectively. The 50% tissue culture infectious dose (TCID 50) was determined by observing CPE using Reed-Muench method [ 30]. Furthermore, working stocks of EV71 containing 10 8 TCID 50/mL were prepared for subsequent experiments.
